page.title: 06Royston since 1930
page.content: 1933 The old cinema,opposite the police station,was burnt down. 1954 The new fire station was built in Baldock Street. 1959 Tannery Drift School was built. 1967 Tannery Drift school roof collapsed 1969 New offices were opened for "The Royston Crow ",the local newspaper. 1975 Roysia Middle School and Roysia First School (now Roman Way First School) were opened. Burns Road housing estate was started. More houses were being built in Gage Close and Green Drift. 1980 Royston by_pass was opened to take traffic round the north of the town instead of though the centre. 1985 A new home for old people was built.More new houses are also being erected.
